results.title: Sai Baba: his life is his message
results.creator_credit: Spiritual Advancement of the Individual Foundation and Richard Boch
results.brief_description: Traces the life of Sai Baba, the leader. The film visually records Sai Baba’s many miracles as they happen, through the eyes of a scientist. The film also carries the universal message of Sathya Sai Baba.

results.title: Saharan venture
results.creator_credit: World Wide Pictures and Harry Woof
results.brief_description: Story of introduction of natural gas to the United Kingdom from Algeria ending dependence on coal. Covers development of fuel tanker designed for ocean transportation of natural gas in 1957 (Methane Pioneer) to arrival of the Methane Princess on October 12th 1964 with first delivery of natural gas to the United Kingdom.

results.title: Saga in stone
results.creator_credit: Documentary Films of India and M. Bhavnani
results.brief_description: Glimpses of a few of the sculptures which made famous the craftsmanship of Indian artists. Among the examples illustrated are the temples of Konarak in Orissa; one of the noblest monuments that man has raised to the Sun God, the Shrine of Kalugumalai carved out of a single rock; the Domambullar in Pudukotah State; the ruins of Hampi in the South; a relic of the Vijayanagar Kingdom, and the shrines at Khajuraho in Central India.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India and M. Bhavnani

results.title: Safety: in danger out of doors
results.creator_credit: Film Company of America, S.M. Tapper and Karl H. Dempwolf
results.brief_description: Safety woman saves children from the dangers of the outdoors. Covers boat safety, hiking and climbing. Stars Susan Valdez. Narrated by Tony Barr. Suitable for middle primary level.

results.title: Safety with small craft
results.creator_credit: Southern Films and Eric L. Morris
results.brief_description: Outlines commonsense safety rules to be followed on rivers, lakes and the sea by water skiers, fishermen, skin-divers, and yachtsmen. Rules regarding life-jackets, giving way, speed limits, and fuelling procedures are illustrated. Suggests simple precautions to be taken by power boat owners to ensure safety.
results.description: Outlines commonsense safety rules to be followed on rivers, lakes and the sea by water skiers, fishermen, skin-divers, and yachtsmen. results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 4
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Details what to do in casualty management, including removal of hazards, assessment of situation, examining the casualty and administering first aid. Narrated by John Granik.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 3
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Head, neck and back injuries - their examination and treatment, and moving the victim if necessary. The causes of burns and scalds, and first aid procedures. First aid for eye injuries, handling and moving casualties, and first aid for victims of poisoning. Narrated by John Granik.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 2
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Explains the symptoms of shock, its causes and treatment. Shows fractures and dislocations; how they occur, and their treatment. Narrated by John Granik.

results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Concentrates on artificial respiration, with demonstrations of various methods, and illustrates causes of loss of breathing. Narrated by John Granik.
